=== PPAs ===

We build packages for Ubuntu Precise and Quantal users:

* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~novacut/+archive/stable|Novacut Stable Releases]]</nowiki> (for artists)
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~novacut/+archive/pre-stable|Novacut Pre-Stable Releases]]</nowiki> (for automated release testing, not recommended for any users)
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~novacut/+archive/daily|Novacut Daily Builds]]</nowiki> (for developers)

For details, see our <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Novacut/ReleaseProcess|Release Process]]</nowiki>.

=== Code (and other stuff) in Launchpad projects ===

* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/novacut-artwork|novacut-artwork]]</nowiki> - various assets for the stunning Novacut brand identity <nowiki>[[http://www.design-by-izo.com/2011/06/27/novacut-brand-identity-design/|design by IZO]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/novacut-prototypes|novacut-prototypes]]</nowiki> - where we rapidly prototype and measure time savings of UI variations before doing full implementations
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/novacut|novacut]]</nowiki> - The main editor component (UI and renderer)
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/dmedia|dmedia]]</nowiki> - Dmedia, our anwser to media asset management
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/filestore|filestore]]</nowiki> - hashing protocol and !FileStore for Dmedia
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/microfiber|microfiber]]</nowiki> - lightweight, high-performance CouchDB adapter for Python3
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/usercouch|usercouch]]</nowiki> - Python3 library for starting per-user CouchDB instances
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/userwebkit|userwebkit]]</nowiki> - Python3 library for building !WebKitGtk apps that talk to CouchDB
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/dc3|dc3]]</nowiki> - a DBus service similar to <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/desktopcouch|desktopcouch]]</nowiki> (not that Dmedia now starts CouchDB itself, but we'll continue to maintain dc3 as a option for people migrating from desktopcouch)

=== Novacut components on ohloh ===

'''ohloh''' is a cool way to visualize and track our progress, and there is a page for each of the 6 modern Novacut components (dc3 is basically being replaced by usercouch, so dc3 was left out):

* <nowiki>[[https://www.ohloh.net/p/dmedia|dmedia]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://www.ohloh.net/p/dmedia-filestore|filestore]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://www.ohloh.net/p/microfiber|microfiber]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://www.ohloh.net/p/usercouch|usercouch]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://www.ohloh.net/p/userwebkit|userwebkit]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://www.ohloh.net/p/novacut|novacut]]</nowiki>
